summary: TRANSMISSION MAKES CLUNKING NOISES WHEN SHIFTING AT 25,33 &46 MPH. SOMETIMES THERE IS A VERY LOUD CLUNK FROM THE TRANSMISSION. THIS HAS BEEN OCCURRING EVER SINCE WE HAD 24000 MILES ON THE VEHICLE. CURRENT MILES 59000MI. GM DEALERSHIPS COULD NOT VERIFY THE NOISES. ONE DEALER CHANGED THE TCM AND TORQUE CONVERTER.  VERY SAME NOISES WITHIN THE SAME WEEK OF THE CHANGE. STILL HAPPENING.
